EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_DSC_Malware Detection_Q315.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Data Science Driven Approaches to Malware Detection Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thursday, October 13, 2015 9AM, PDT REGISTER <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1050245/4829B37368BD3529DC6C2AD4A62B9F3B?partnerref=Pivotal> Join Pivotal and Data Science Central Malware detection within enterprise networks is a critical component of an effective information security strategy. Instances of malware attacks are increasing â€“ making them especially important to detect. Register <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1050245/4829B37368BD3529DC6C2AD4A62B9F3B?partnerref=Pivotal> now for this exclusive event. Register <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1050245/4829B37368BD3529DC6C2AD4A62B9F3B?partnerref=Pivotal> now for this exclusive event. Attend this webinar to learn about:
- The latest approaches to finding domains that have time and user-based co-occurrence relationships. - Scalable and operationalizable frameworks to detect domain associations by analyzing the web traffic of users in any organization. - How identifying low-support and high-confidence malicious domain associations can aid in the detection of coordinated network intrusions.
